resources.string: To start your journey in Proton VPN please assign VPN connections to your account or any other sub-account.
This step will take just a few minutes. After that you will be able to sign in and protect all your devices.
There is currently no VPN connection enabled for this account. To start your journey with Proton VPN, please contact your administrator.
Server you are currently trying to connect is under maintenance. Please try another server.
Your account currently has an overdue invoice. Please pay all unpaid invoices at account.protonvpn.com
You have hit the maximum number of simultaneous connections allowed for your account. Please upgrade your Proton VPN plan to get more connections.
Couldn\'t establish VPN connection automatically. Please connect manually one time to grant permissions.
Please check your connection and try again.
Couldn\'t connect to the VPN. Please check your connection and try again.

Proton VPN could not establish a VPN connection. Please, try again in few seconds.
Details: %1$s
Please describe the bug and how and where you found it
Action needed to connect to VPN
To connect to Proton VPN, please do the following:
Android needs your permission to connect to Proton VPN. Grant it by tapping \"OK\" when you get the \"Connection request\" window from Android.
Disable always-on for other VPN apps
Android does not support multiple VPN apps. Disable always-on for any VPN app other than Proton VPN.
Enable notifications to get alerted about changes to your connection status.

Please disable always-on VPN for all other VPN apps in the Android VPN system settings, as that prevents Proton VPN from establishing a VPN connection. Please also grant VPN permissions if a dialog requesting VPN permissions appears. Other VPN apps may also need to be uninstalled to prevent conflicts. Afterwards, please try again. Learn more
This sends local error logs (we don\'t log activity) to help us fix your problem
Add apps to be excluded from the VPN traffic.
Add apps to be included in the VPN traffic.
These apps are excluded from your VPN connection.
Only these apps connect through VPN.
%1$s could not be opened. Web browser was not detected on your device.
Connection timed out. Please try again.
Please make sure your internet connection is working.
Try connecting to Proton from a different network (or use TOR)
Temporarily disable or remove your antivirus software.
Disable any proxies or firewalls, or contact your network administrator.
Check Proton Status for our system status.
Still need help? Contact us directly
In case Proton is blocked, allow app to try alternative paths to reach Proton servers. Learn more
Your country may be blocking access to Proton. Try using TOR to access Proton.
How to turn on always-on VPN and kill switch:
1. Open your device’s Settings by tapping the button below
3. Tap the switch next to Always-on VPN to enable it
4. Tap the switch next to Block connections without VPN to enable kill switch
Activating kill switch will disable split tunneling, as kill switch blocks all connections outside the VPN tunnel
Usage data helps us overcome VPN blocks and improve app performance.
Crash reports help us fix bugs, detect firewalls, and avoid VPN blocks.
These statistics do not contain your IP address, and they cannot be used to identify you. We\'ll never share them with third parties. Learn more
Protect yourself from ads, malware, and trackers on websites and apps. If websites don’t load, try disabling NetShield. %1$s
Disguise the Proton VPN app with a discreet icon. Notifications will still display the default Proton VPN name and icon. %1$s
Block ads, trackers, and malware on websites and apps
Cookies and other trackers that store and share information about your internet activity
The amount of unwanted data from ads, trackers, and malware blocked by NetShield

plurals.comment: Number of ads blocked by netshield. Number displayed above the text

plurals.name: netshield_trackers_stopped
plurals.comment: Number of trackers stopped by netshield. Number displayed above the text

string.name: netshield_data_saved
string.comment: Total data saved by netshield shown in kb/mb

resources.string: Some websites may not load properly when ads and trackers are blocked.
Trying to circumvent network issues. This will help you access Proton VPN.
Couldn\'t initialise VPN connection due to a conflict between dual-app (for example Dual Messenger) and Split Tunneling. Please, disable one of those and reboot your device.
P2P is not allowed on this server
This profile\'s VPN protocol is currently not available. To connect, try changing the protocol.
Stream your favorite content. Access more apps with a Proton VPN Plus plan.
Stream more of your favourite content with a Proton VPN Plus plan.
This country isn’t available. Get more streaming options with a Proton VPN Plus plan.
Stream your favourite videos, movies, or sports with your apps.
Watch video content from over 50 countries, including YouTube and Twitch. Stream Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu with Proton VPN Plus.
Get your Proton VPN account at %1$s
Go to %1$s on your mobile device or computer
Your session is expired. Click refresh to start over again.
Visit %1$s to upgrade to Proton VPN Plus now.
Get a Proton VPN Plus plan to access 500+ servers worldwide and optimized streaming options for Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Disney+, and many more.
Are you sure you want to sign out?
This will disconnect your TV from any VPN server.
Please try again later or select a different country.
Your Proton VPN subscription plan has expired
We had to downgrade your plan, but we’re reconnecting you to the fastest server available on that plan.
Your Proton VPN account has pending invoices
Please take a moment to update your billing information to keep your subscription active.
You have reached your maximum device limit

Please disconnect another device to connect this one or upgrade to Plus to get up to %1$d devices connected at the same time.

resources.string: Please disconnect another device to connect this one.
You are on the Free plan. Free servers and features are available.
You are on the Basic plan. Basic & Free servers and features are available.
You will be able to access premium features again after pending invoices are paid.
Proton VPN detected that your current network is preventing a connection to the VPN. Enabling Smart Protocol might bypass these limitations.
Advanced features: NetShield, Secure Core, TOR, P2P
Access streaming services (Netflix, Disney+, etc) anywhere in the world
Upgrade again to enjoy all the features:
Proton VPN is available on 8 different platorms.
Get advanced privacy features and higher speed with VPN Plus.
Block ads, trackers and malware with NetShield.
Add another layer of encryption to your VPN connection with Secure Core.
Unlock peer-to-peer (P2P) downloads and file sharing
Improve your upload and download speeds while hiding your IP address.
Get quick access to your frequent connections
Enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows from anywhere in the world.
Access the Tor network in one tap
Connect to hidden services and onion sites with your regular browser.
Unlock faster, less crowded servers with speeds of up to %1$d Gbps.
Get the best of both worlds
Divide your traffic into VPN and non-VPN tunnels with split tunneling.
Access devices on your local area network (LAN) with VPN Plus.
All premium Proton services. One easy subscription.
Get complete privacy coverage with Proton Unlimited.
%1$d GB total storage for photos, files, and mail
Share photos and files via link
Unlock even more performance and privacy features
Security and privacy on all your devices
Add another layer of encryption to your VPN connection
Download files through BitTorrent and other file sharing protocols
Browse at even higher speeds (up to %1$d Gbps)
Browse from two locations at once
Watch your favorite movies and TV shows
Use the Tor network over your VPN connection for extra privacy
This technology allows Proton VPN to provide higher speed and security in difficult-to-serve countries.
Browse privately, access blocked content, and enjoy digital freedom.
These tips could help to solve your issue faster.
We’ll get back to you as soon as we can.
A log is a type of file that shows us the actions you took that led to an error. We’ll only ever use them to help our engineers fix bugs.
Error logs help us to get to the bottom of your issue. If you don’t include them, we might not be able to investigate fully.
You’re more likely to have issues on older versions of Proton VPN.
Want to connect to a specific country?
Improve online gaming and video call performance with NAT type 2.
Proton Free automatically connects you to the fastest available server. This will normally be the closest server to your location.
Get worldwide coverage with VPN Plus

resources.string: The best server based on your location
Customize how the Proton VPN app appears on your device. Why?
This will cause the Proton VPN app to close. To restart Proton VPN, just tap your new app icon.
You’ve reached the maximum number of Free server changes for now.
Get unlimited changes with VPN Plus.
We updated our designs and moved some things around to make the app easier to use.
It’s now even easier to reconnect to your favorite servers. View your most recent connections on the home screen, or pin them for quick access. Recents replaces Profiles.
There are now Free servers in Poland and Romania. To prevent server crowding, we removed manual country selection and made major improvements to automatic server selection.
Enjoy extra privacy features, supercharged performance, and next-level VPN customization.

Congratulations! You unlocked premium security and performance features on all Proton services, plus %1$d GB total storage.

Enjoy the best of Proton privacy.
You\'ve upgraded your subscription. Enjoy advanced privacy features and next-level performance.
Your VPN activity is protected by Swiss privacy laws. We’ll never track you online or share your information with third parties.
All servers in this country are under maintenance
All servers in this city are under maintenance
All servers in this state are under maintenance
Server load shows how close a server is to its maximum capacity. \n\nA high server load can slow down your connection.
VPN may run slower than normal
A protocol is a set of instructions your device follows to connect and communicate with a server.
Secure Core connects you to your destination server via a second, maximum security VPN server.\n\nThis higher level of protection may cause higher latency and slower speeds.
Connect to a Tor server to access hidden services and onion sites using any browser.
How to access the Tor network
Streaming servers are designed for fast and secure TV and movie playback.
Go to your phone settings and turn off location services
Connect to any Plus server and start streaming
Peer-to-peer file sharing is enabled on this server.
You can connect to .onion sites with your regular browser.
Your activity is encrypted behind 2 high-security VPN servers.
This server is optimized for TV and movie playback.
Connects you to your destination country through servers that are physically located somewhere else.
Servers are physically located in %1$s, but you’ll appear to be browsing from %2$s.
This graph shows the speed of your current upload and download activity. Your VPN connection is unlikely to slow down normal online activity.
This device does not allow VPN connections.
Profile name must be 30 characters or less
Increase your connection speed by up to 400%% with performance enhancing technologies. %1$s
If Proton services are blocked due to network restrictions, we’ll try using alternative network routing to connect you to our sites.
Allows you to connect to printers, speakers, and other devices in your device’s local network.
Select a network address translation type for your connection. %1$s
Select a network address translation type for your connection.
Restricts the data entering your network. This option is more secure, but can make peer-to-peer gaming connections more difficult.
Some restriction on data entering your network. This option is best for online video gaming.
Customize your connection by deciding which apps and IP addresses are protected by VPN. %1$s
A VPN protocol determines how data moves between a VPN server and your device. %1$s
A VPN protocol determines how data moves between a VPN server and your device.
Auto-selects the best protocol for your connection.
State-of-the-art protocol for security and performance.
State-of-the-art protocol for security and performance.
Established, well-tested, and secure. OpenVPN is less battery-efficient than some other protocols.
Established, well-tested, and secure. OpenVPN is reliable in poor network conditions, but may not be as fast as other protocols.

Overcomes VPN blocks by hiding your VPN connection from censors. This protocol is DPI (deep packet inspection) resistant, but may not be as fast as other protocols. Stealth is exclusive to Proton VPN.
Selected apps and IP addresses are excluded from VPN connection.
Only selected apps and IP addresses connect through VPN, all other traffic is unprotected.

string.name: settings_split_tunneling_empty
string.comment: Used to indicate that no IP or Apps are included in split tunneling

string.name: settings_split_tunneling_excluded_format
string.comment: Used for describing excluded items. Example: Chrome, Facebook and 2 more. The same logic used for IP addresses too.

resources.string: Remove IP address from the list?
New settings will apply next time you connect.
New settings will apply next time you connect.
Peer-to-peer (P2P) technology allows you to connect and share files directly with other devices.\n\nOur P2P servers are specially designed to support this type of file sharing.
The fast sharing and downloading of large files over a P2P network.
Why use a P2P server when torrenting?
Hide your IP address from your service provider and peers

Smart Routing uses virtual servers to provide VPN coverage in hard-to-reach countries.

When you connect to a Smart Routing server, you’ll appear to be browsing in your destination country, even though the physical server is located elsewhere. 

Smart Routing is typically used to get around anti-privacy laws and other forms of censorship.
Get worldwide coverage with VPN Plus

Customize your connection by deciding which apps are protected by VPN.
Selected apps are excluded from VPN connection.
Only selected apps connect through VPN, all other traffic is unprotected.
There was a problem setting up ProtonVPN. Click to open the app.
Profiles are saved connections with your choice of location, server, and protocol.
Your server selection for %1$s is unavailable. Select a different server or try again later.
